author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: بسراب بقیعة وأعرضتم عن بحر الّذي جعله الله عَذْبًا سَایِغًا فویلٌ لکم بما بدّلتم نعمة الله وکنتم من الّذینهم کفروا بنفسي أوّل مرّة إن أنتم في أنفسکم تفقهون إِذًا قوموا
translation: Will ye be content with that which is like the vapor in a plain, and be willing to forgo the Ocean Whose waters refresh, by virtue of the Will of God, the souls of men? Woe unto you, for having repaid the bounty of God with so vain and contemptible a thing! Ye are, indeed, of them that have rejected Me in My previous Revelation. Would that your hearts could comprehend!
